title: Russia storms Mariupol plant as some evacuees reach safety - The Associated Press
content:
1. Russia storms Mariupol plant as some evacuees reach safety  The Associated Press
  2. Ukrainian civilians evacuated from Mariupol's steel plant - BBC News  BBC News
  3. Russia's war in Ukraine: Live updates  CNN
  4. Russia-Ukraine War Live Updates: Biden News, Mariupol and the Latest  The New York Times
  5. Civilians rescued from Mariupol steel plant head for safety  POLITICO
description: ZAPORIZHZHIA, Ukraine (AP) â€” Russian forces Tuesday began storming the steel mill containing the last pocket of resistance in Mariupol, Ukrainian defenders said, just as scores of civilians evacuated from the bombed-out plant over the weekend reached relative safety and recounted days and nights filled with dread from constant shelling.
